About Me

I am Yubo Huang (黄昱博). I was born in Shanxi, China, in 1998. I received my B.S. degree from Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications in 2020. I received my M.Eng. degree from Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications in 2023. I received my M.Sc. degree from Laurentian University in 2025.

I am actively looking for a Ph.D. position related to Computer Vision and Machine Learning in Canada for 2026. Please feel free to contact me if you are interested.

My research interests include multimodality machine learning and efficient machine learning. And I am happy to learn and explore what is cool. Previously, my research lay at the intersection of image restoration and deep learning – with a special focus on iris image restoration aiming to improve iris recognition.

Publications
